attributes.action: Scrap plans to implement vaccine passports for indoor venues.
attributes.additional_details:
Nightclubs and similar venues had been closed for nearly 490 days when this was announced. 
I do not believe that this rule is meant to protect anyone, only coerce younger people to get vaccinated. A double vaccinated individual can still catch and pass covid on. So my question is: if I have 2 jabs and also covid am I more welcome to absolute freedom than if I had 0 jabs and no covid? 
Now is the time for freedom.
Say no to this rule. 
We are young and healthy.
attributes.background: From the end of September 2021 the government wants to introduce vaccine passports as a requirement to enter large/ crowded indoor venues such as nightclubs. This was announced just as restrictions were lifted on the 19th.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Do not require Covid vaccination passports for crowded events: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592671

Don't restrict admission to nightclubs to only vaccinated customers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/592668

Outlaw discrimination against those who do not get a Covid-19 vaccination: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/575801
